description.value: You're determined to amass a fortune and send a portion of the profits back home. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Additional Lore] general feat for one Lore skill of your choiceâ€”the Lore you choose must be related to your business or profession, such as Accounting Lore, Corporate Lore, or Legal Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Earn Income] with your chosen Lore. In addition, whenever you successfully Earn Income, you earn an additional 10%. This additional income is transferred directly to your home community's accounts and can't be accessed or used by you in any way.
